daily_life.title: Panathenaic Stadium

introduction.title: Welcome to Ancient Greece
introduction.narration: Welcome to the world of ancient Greece, a civilization that shaped Western culture through philosophy, democracy, art, and architecture.

architecture_tour.title: Architectural Marvels
architecture_tour.narration: Greek architecture featured magnificent temples with Doric, Ionic, and Corinthian columns, theaters with perfect acoustics, and structures built to honor the gods.

sculpture_showcase.title: Classical Sculpture
sculpture_showcase.narration: Greek sculptors achieved unprecedented realism and beauty, capturing human form and emotion in marble and bronze.

daily_life.title: Life in Ancient Athens
daily_life.narration: Greeks gathered in the agora for commerce and debate, competed in athletic games, and celebrated with wine served in beautifully painted vessels.
